title: SQL ServerCURRENT_USERFunction

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerCURRENT_USERFunction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the name of the current user in the SQL Server database:
SELECT CURRENT_USER;

Definition and Usage
The CURRENT_USER function returns the name of the current user in the SQL Server database.
Syntax
CURRENT_USER
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1
